info_CN: 减论Agent通过算法为您推荐
香港科技大学（广州）提出了ReconVLA方法
该方法通过基于视觉输出的扩散transformer重建图像注视区域
实现隐式视觉注意力定位
从而提升机器人对目标物体的精细感知与操作能力
The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou)
a reconstructive Vision-Language-Action model that uses a diffusion transformer conditioned on visual outputs to reconstruct gaze regions corresponding to target objects
thereby guiding visual attention grounding for precise manipulation
